articles.author: John Schuhmann
articles.title: Knicks-Pacers: 5 takeaways from Indiana's stunning comeback in Game 1 - NBA
articles.description: Down 17 in the 4th and 14 with little more than 3 minutes left in regulation, Indiana rallies to win in overtime.
articles.content:
Down 14 with 3 minutes left, Tyrese Haliburton's buzzer-beater sends Game 1 to overtime and helps Indiana stun New York.
NEW YORK — The Indiana Pacers do not play conventional NBA basketball in eith… [+9260 chars]
